definition: fitting snugly/appropriate/suitable/variant of 貼|贴[tie1]/to paste/to obey

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.chinese: 關於IIS服務器的安全的博客帖子。

sentences.english: Every post will have a random string as the unique key.
sentences.chinese: 每一個帖子將使用一個隨機字符串作爲惟一鍵。

sentences.english: Only original posts can be added as Elite posts.
sentences.chinese: 只有優秀的原創帖子可以考慮加精處理。

sentences.english: Now the post has become an effective means of promotion.
sentences.chinese: 現在發帖子成爲人們進行推廣的一種有效手段。

sentences.english: This post showcases the most unusual and creative advertising campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 這篇帖子陳列了最與衆不同和有創意的廣告宣傳。

sentences.english: Hereunder something regarding the tree will be presented.
sentences.chinese: 在接下來的帖子裏面，將介紹麪包樹相關知識。

sentences.english: Reporters in a number of community forums inquiry found the solution to the post.
sentences.chinese: 記者在一些社區論壇上發現詢問解決辦法的帖子。

sentences.english: Hi, I saw your post on 58. com. Can I come and see the house?
sentences.chinese: 我在58同城看到你的帖子，我能過來看看房嗎？

sentences.english: Oh regarding your forum post.. I'll get to that ASAP.
sentences.chinese: 噢，關於你在論壇上的帖子，我會盡快回復的。

sentences.english: SMSs, videos and tweets spread quickly and exponentially.
sentences.chinese: 短信，視頻和帖子以指數的速度傳播。

sentences.english: And the "low-key" launch via casual blog post?
sentences.chinese: 並且，用臨時的博客帖子“低調的”發佈？

sentences.english: Tens of millions of weibo posts are created and reposted each day in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，每天產生數以千萬計原創或轉發的微博帖子。

sentences.english: Many posts on domestic blogs and message boards that discussed the demonstration were taken down.
sentences.chinese: 許多國內博客的帖子和留言板都在討論示威遭到壓制。

sentences.english: His conversations with his readers often generate ideas for future posts.
sentences.chinese: 他和讀者之間的對話常常產生未來帖子的靈感。

sentences.english: An online contest challenged people to work "Myfather is Li Gang" into classical poetry.
sentences.chinese: 一個帖子號召人們把“我爸是李剛”組合進古詩中。

sentences.english: This is the story: about three years ago, they posted their the articles.
sentences.chinese: 那是三年前，他們在清地發帖子。

definition: to post (an item on a forum)
to reply to an invitation/(Internet) to post a comment on a forum topic
fitting snugly/appropriate/suitable/variant of 貼|贴[tie1]/to paste/to obey
Zhihu, Chinese Q&A website modeled on Quora, at zhihu.com, launched in Jan 2011
to stick sth up (on the wall)/to post (on a noticeboard or website)
blog article/to write a blog article (netspeak)
tweet (on Twitter)/(HK, Tw) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/to reply to original poster (or recommend a post) on PTT bulletin board
Moments (social networking function of smartphone app WeChat 微信[Wei1 xin4])
